title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Indian Wells Masters Men's Doubles Final Rounds and Seeds Progress
text: March 17, 2018 / 1:24 AM / Updated 20 hours ago ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Indian Wells Masters Men's Doubles Final Rounds and Seeds Progress Reuters Staff 7 Min Read Mar 17 (OPTA) - Final Rounds and Seeds Progress from the ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Indian Wells Masters Men's Doubles matches on Friday .. Final Rounds ..
